                       throws RemoteException

                              String name,
                              String familyName)
                       throws RemoteException
        Creates new person with given parameters

        If person with given passport already exists return existing person

        passport - person's passport
        name - person's name
        familyName - person's second name

        RemotePerson

        RemoteException
